sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> grown in a <radical>warehouse</radical> will be very <kanji>pale</kanji>. They never see the sun, so they don't grow to have bright colors.
meaningInfo: Imagine walking into a warehouse and seeing hundreds of pale flowers growing in it. It's subtle, but beautiful.
readingMnemonic: When you grow <kanji>pale</kanji> flowers like this, they don't grow a <reading>soul</reading> (<ja>そう</ja>). Soul adds color to plants and flowers. That's probably why ghosts and dead bodies are pale too.
readingInfo: Picture a bunch of pale, soulless flowers. You pick one up and it falls apart in your hands.
